actions.text: Look at cards, bid number of tricks to win.
actions.title: Bid

actions.text: Player may bid Nil to win no tricks. Success: win 100pts. Failure: lose 100pts.
actions.title: Nil

actions.text: Record combined bids for each partnership.
actions.title: End of Bidding

actions.text: Left of dealer leads. Lead any suit but not spades until a spade has been played (broken).
actions.title: Play
Trick

actions.text: Play card following suit if possible.
actions.title: Follow Suit

actions.text: Trick won by (a) highest Spade. Otherwise (b) highest rank of lead suit.
actions.title: Winner

actions.subtitle: Repeat until all cards have been played

actions.text: If partnership Bid success, each trick 10pts.
actions.title: Bid Success

actions.text: Each trick over Bid 1pt and added to Sandbags tally.
actions.title: Overbids

actions.text: If partnership Bid failure, each trick negative 10pts.
actions.title: Bid Failure

actions.text: If partnership Sandbags tally reaches 10, lose 100pts. Multiple Sandbags penalties may be scored.
actions.title: Sandbag Penalty
